mapper.insert: insert into com_dict_value (dictcode, itemcode, itemvalue) values (#{dictcode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemvalue, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into com_dict_value (dictcode, itemcode, itemvalue) values (#{item.dictcode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.itemcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemvalue, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from com_dict_value where 1=1 and dictcode = #{0} and itemcode = #{1}
